import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {MatFormFieldModule} from '@angular/material/form-field'; import { MatInputModule } from '@angular/material/input' import {MatIconModule} from '@angular/material/icon'; import {MatButtonModule} from '@angular/material/button'; @Component({ selector: 'app-auth', templateUrl: './auth.component.html', styleUrls: ['./auth.component.scss'], standalone: true, imports: [MatFormFieldModule, MatInputModule, MatIconModule, MatButtonModule] }) export class AuthComponent { isShowPassword = false; toggleShowPassword(event: MouseEvent): void { this.isShowPassword = !this.isShowPassword; event.stopPropagation(); } }
